ingredients.ingredient: 6 slices bacon, cut into bite-size pieces
1 (12 ounce) package fresh Brussels sprouts, trimmed and sliced
2 tablespoons white sugar, or to taste (Optional)
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Cook bacon first until crispy, then use the rendered fat to cook Brussels sprouts
Slice Brussels sprouts thinly and evenly for consistent cooking
Don't stir too frequently—let them sit to develop caramelized edges
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show me how to make crispy fried Brussels sprouts with bacon and caramelized edges.
